rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员在硬脑膜窦和颅骨中发现脑体免疫联系伦敦国王学院精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 的新研究为脑-体免疫连接提供了宝贵的见解，确定了脑后部硬脑膜窦和颅骨骨髓中的关键通信枢纽。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Researchers-find-brain-body-immune-link-in-the-dural-sinuses-and-skull-marrow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Researchers-find-brain-body-immune-link-in-the-dural-sinuses-and-skull-marrow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ee7ec0a-15b0-4fd6-8541-c8def7ef1f5c Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:17:04 -0500 Researchers find brain-body immune link in the dural sinuses and skull marrow
晚吃早餐可降低 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖峰值不早吃早餐可能会降低 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖峰值，而晚吃早餐则显示出显着的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Eating-breakfast-later-lowers-blood-sugar-spikes-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Eating-breakfast-later-lowers-blood-sugar-spikes-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fc007e7-a289-4a32-ac45-031a9072ed89 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:05:00 -0500 Eating breakfast later lowers blood sugar spikes in type 2 diabetes patients
经济困难仍然阻碍许多哮喘患者服用药物呼吸医学杂志在线发表的一项研究表明，尽管过去十年中因费用问题而无法按处方服药的哮喘患者人数有所下降，但经济困难仍然是六分之一的哮喘患者的阻碍因素胸部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Financial-hardship-still-prevents-many-asthma-病人-from-takeing-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Financial-hardship-still-prevents-many-asthma-病人-from-take-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e060307-2015-479f-9e8b-ecc2ae1b9389 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:01:29 -0500 Financial hardship still prevents many asthma patients from taking medications
新的三联疗法为复发和新诊断的白血病带来希望由德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的三项临床试验表明，新型三联疗法在治疗复发性或难治性和新诊断的白血病方面取得了显着的积极效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-triplet-therapies-show-promise-for-relapsed-and-newly-diagnosed-leukemias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-triplet-therapies-show-promise-for-relapsed-and-newly-diagnosed-leukemias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11ae7783-33be-4761-8535-da0bb9860ab2 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:45:09 -0500 New triplet therapies show promise for relapsed and newly diagnosed leukemias
吸烟与骨髓增生异常综合征基因突变增加有关一项新的研究显示，患有骨髓增生异常综合征（MDS）或先兆病症的吸烟者与该疾病相关的基因突变水平升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Smoking-linked-to-increased-genic-mutations-in-myelodys Plastic-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Smoking-linked-to-increased-genic-mutations-in-myelodys Plastic-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1d811de-027b-49a4-9434-9ce41b019369 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:44:02 -0500 Smoking linked to increased genetic mutations in myelodysplastic syndromes
茶、苹果和巧克力被证明可以支持肝脏健康富含类黄酮的饮食，包括苹果、茶和黑巧克力，可以显着降低非酒精性脂肪肝病 (NAFLD) 的风险，并改善肝脏健康生物标志物。这些发现凸显了膳食类黄酮在对抗肝脏脂肪堆积和炎症方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Tea-apples-and-chocolate-proven-to-support-liver-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Tea-apples-and-chocolate-proven-to-support-liver-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96eee635-a729-4bdf-8fd3-46adb212ce4b Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:25:00 -0500 Tea, apples, and chocolate proven to support liver health
一流的单克隆抗体有望治疗罕见的侵袭性高炎症性疾病新诊断的恶性肿瘤相关噬血细胞性淋巴组织细胞增多症 (mHLH) 是一种罕见的侵袭性高炎症性疾病，接受一流单克隆抗体 ELA026 治疗的成年患者的缓解率为 100%，并且两个月后的生存率有所提高德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员表示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/First-in-class-monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-for-rare-aggressive-hyperlingual-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/First-in-class-monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-for-rare-aggressive-hyperlingual-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d413eae-29ea-4d3b-b13e-b60796634438 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:22:08 -0500 First-in-class monoclonal antibody shows promise for rare, aggressive hyperinflammatory condition
研究发现饮食模式影响地中海饮食的坚持葡萄牙研究人员探索了橄榄油的消费和对地中海饮食的坚持，揭示了主要障碍和消费模式。研究结果强调需要制定量身定制的策略来促进这种促进健康的生活方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Research-uncovers-dietary-patterns-influencing-Mediterranean-Diet-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Research-uncovers-dietary-patterns-influencing-Mediterranean-Diet-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eceec545-a923-4d9e-9656-8fbfdb63f0a7 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:00:00 -0500 Research uncovers dietary patterns influencing Mediterranean Diet adherence
生活方式和健康如何影响您患痴呆症的风险兰德公司的新研究利用具有全国代表性的美国数据集确定了认知障碍和痴呆症的早期预测因素，强调了可改变因素和基线认知健康在预防和干预策略中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/How-lifestyle-and-health-shape-your-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/How-lifestyle-and-health-shape-your-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d11d0d04-9db3-4d81-8b13-66d40a7f32e4 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 22:42:00 -0500 How lifestyle and health shape your dementia risk
UVM科学家发现大脑血流调节的新机制由佛蒙特大学拉纳医学院的 Mark Nelson 博士领导的 UVM 科学家团队发现了一种新的机制，它重塑了我们对大脑血流如何调节的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/UVM-scientists-discover-new-mechanism-for-blood-flow-regulation-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/UVM-scientists-discover-new-mechanism-for-blood-flow-regulation-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8f87a1d-f86c-4c64-8a45-78ce3a171694 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 21:11:54 -0500 UVM scientists discover new mechanism for blood flow regulation in the brain
